title: Construction of this chapter
context: ยง48E-19 Construction of this chapter. The powers conferred by this chapter shall be supplemental to the powers conferred by any other law. Nothing contained in this chapter shall prohibit a county from providing for a pollution control project of the nature described in this part as a public undertaking, improvement, or system under chapter 47 or 49. [L 1983, c 237, pt of ยง2]
